CGR.JO.summary: Calgro M3 Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the development of integrated residential properties in South Africa. The company operates through three segments: Residential Property Development, Memorial Parks, and Residential Rental Investments. It also develops and manages memorial parks, as well as provides burial rights and maintenance services. The company also invests in real estate properties. Calgro M3 Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.
